Notice

The government orders that the Gentlemen Commanders of Brigades, Corps, and Squadrons, as soon as they receive this, pass on, through the appropriate channels, to the Excellent

The government also recommends that the Gentlemen Commanders of Divisions, Brigades, etc., through whose conduit the said reports must be sent, mention the order officers who are not attached or assigned to any of the corps. The government expects from said Gentlemen Commanders a scrupulous examination and much circumspection regarding this requirement.

Secretary of State for War Affairs in Piratini, August 31, 1837. In the absence of the Excellent Sir Domingos José de Almeida. (a) Antônio Vicente de Siqueira Pereira Leitão.

Illustrious Sir Colonel João Antônio da Silveira. Commander of the Central Column. Wherever you may be. From the Ministry of the Interior, Treasury and War.
